name: Custom Unit Converter Widget
author: Cabinetry Depot

sections.description:
Simple measurement converter widget. There is a possibility to add custom units in admin area and disable or delete units.

Here are the Measurements and units included as presets:
* Angle – units Degree, Gradian, Radian
* Area – units Acres, Hectares, Square centimeter, Square feet, square inch, square kilometer, square meters, square mile, square millimeter, square yard
* Length – meter, centimeter, millimeter, foot, inch, rod, yard, mile, nautical mile
* Temperature – Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kelvin
* Volume Fluid – fluid ounce UK, fluid ounce US, Gallon UK and US, Pint UK and US, liter, quart UK and US, milliliter
* Volume Solid – cubic centimeter, cubic meter, cubic feet, cubic inch, cubic yard
* Weight – gram, kilogram, ounce, pound, stone
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload measure-converter-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Widgets; You’ll see a new widget called ‘Measure Converter Widget’. Drag and Drop it in the sidebar.
  4. Check the measures you want to user be able to convert.
  5. Add custom groups and units if you need.
